forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco greets you with a mostly sunny disposition, though the warmth of summer is tempered by a gentle west-southwest wind, rustling through the trees. The streets will soon shimmer under this balmy sky, illuminated by temperatures gently cascading from a high near 74, settling at a comfortable 72 as the day progresses. Embraced by clarity, the horizon stretches without the burden of fog—an inviting sight that hints at strolls among the iconic landmarks or the quietude of a nearby café terrace. 

As twilight approaches, the sky will don a more introspective demeanor, revealing soft, drifting clouds while the temperature dips to a modest 57. The same brisk winds will persist, carrying with them the saltiness of the bay, lending a unique vibrancy to the evening air. It’s a time when light sweaters or light jackets become indispensable companions, allowing you to savor an idyllic sunset, perhaps while exploring the bustling urban landscape by foot or sharing a moment in one of the city’s enchanting parks. The day and its evening urges you to embrace the simple pleasures of city life, whether you find solace in art, culinary adventures, or simply watching the world pass by.
